Sentencas: Steam and autothermal reforming reactions of LPG (propane/butane) over high surface area CeO2 (CeO2 (HSA)) synthesized by a surfactant-assisted approach were studied under solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) operating conditions.
Titulo: Hydrogen production from steam and autothermal reforming of LPG over high surface area ceria

Sentencas: The catalyst provides significantly higher reforming reactivity and excellent resistance toward carbon deposition compared to the conventional Ni/Al2O3.
Titulo: Hydrogen production from steam and autothermal reforming of LPG over high surface area ceria

Sentencas: These benefits of CeO2 are due to the redox property of this material.
Titulo: Hydrogen production from steam and autothermal reforming of LPG over high surface area ceria

Sentencas: During the reforming process, the gas-solid reactions between the hydrocarbons present in the system (i.e. C4H10, C3H8, C2H6, C2H4, and CH4) and the lattice oxygen (O-o(x)) take place on the ceria surface.
Titulo: Hydrogen production from steam and autothermal reforming of LPG over high surface area ceria

Sentencas: The reactions of these adsorbed surface hydrocarbons with the lattice oxygen (CnHm + O-o(x) -> nCO + m/2(H-2) + V-o(..) + 2e') can produce synthesis gas (CO and H-2) and also prevent the formation of carbon species from hydrocarbons decomposition reactions (CnHm double left right arrow nC + 2mH(2)).
Titulo: Hydrogen production from steam and autothermal reforming of LPG over high surface area ceria

Titulo: Hydrogen production from steam and autothermal reforming of LPG over high surface area ceria

Sentencas: Oox + H2)- It should be noted that Vo(..) denotes as an oxygen vacancy with an effective charge 2(+).
Titulo: Hydrogen production from steam and autothermal reforming of LPG over high surface area ceria

Sentencas: At 900 degrees C, the main products from steam reforming over CeO2 (HSA) were H-2, CO, CO2, and CH4 with a small amount of C2H4.
Titulo: Hydrogen production from steam and autothermal reforming of LPG over high surface area ceria

Sentencas: The addition of oxygen in autothermal reforming was found to reduce the degree of carbon deposition and improve product selectivities by completely eliminating C2H4 formation.
Titulo: Hydrogen production from steam and autothermal reforming of LPG over high surface area ceria

Sentencas: The major consideration in the autothermal reforming operation is the O-2/LPG (O/C molar ratio) ratio, as the presence of a too high oxygen concentration could oxidize the hydrogen and carbon monoxide produced from the steam reforming.
Titulo: Hydrogen production from steam and autothermal reforming of LPG over high surface area ceria

Sentencas: A suitable O/C molar ratio for autothermal reforming of CeO2 (HSA) was 0.6.
Titulo: Hydrogen production from steam and autothermal reforming of LPG over high surface area ceria
